body_html:
The problem was solved by closed an unused TensorArray .

I create 4 TensorArrays to store hidden state and memory state of LSTM for encoder and decoder.
The memory state is not used during decoding, then just remember to close it at running the session.

Many thank guys.

body:
The problem was solved by closed an unused TensorArray .

I create 4 TensorArrays to store hidden state and memory state of LSTM for encoder and decoder.
The memory state is not used during decoding, then just remember to close it at running the session.

Many thank guys.
